description: '''Byron Lee and the Dragonaires''' (known as '''Byron Lee's Dragonaires''' after Lee's death and now '''The Dragonaires''') are a Jamaican [[ska]], [[Calypso music|calypso]] and [[Soca music|soca]] band. The band played a crucial pioneering role in bringing Caribbean music to the world. [[Byron Lee]] died on 4 November 2008, after suffering from [[cancer]] for a sustained period.
